intelligence.attentionEconomics: Size hierarchy: sm=tertiary actions, md=secondary interactions, lg=primary calls-to-action. Primary variant commands highest attention - use sparingly (maximum 1 per section)
intelligence.accessibility: WCAG AAA compliant with 44px minimum touch targets, high contrast ratios, and screen reader optimization
intelligence.trustBuilding: Destructive actions require confirmation patterns. Loading states prevent double-submission. Visual feedback reinforces user actions.
intelligence.semanticMeaning: Variant mapping: primary=main actions, secondary=supporting actions, destructive=irreversible actions with safety patterns

intelligence.attentionEconomics: Neutral structural element: Controls content width and breathing room without competing for attention
intelligence.accessibility: Semantic HTML elements with proper landmark roles for screen readers
intelligence.trustBuilding: Predictable boundaries and consistent spacing patterns
intelligence.semanticMeaning: Content width control and semantic structure: main=primary content, section=grouped content, article=standalone content

intelligence.attentionEconomics: Preset hierarchy: linear=democratic attention, golden=hierarchical flow, bento=complex attention patterns, custom=user-defined
intelligence.accessibility: WCAG AAA compliance with keyboard navigation, screen reader patterns, and ARIA grid support for interactive layouts
intelligence.trustBuilding: Mathematical spacing (golden ratio), Miller's Law cognitive load limits, consistent preset behavior builds user confidence
intelligence.semanticMeaning: Layout intelligence: linear=equal-priority content, golden=natural hierarchy, bento=content showcases with semantic asymmetry, custom=specialized layouts

intelligence.attentionEconomics: State management: closed=compact display, open=full options, searching=filtered results
intelligence.accessibility: Keyboard navigation, screen reader announcements, focus management, option grouping
intelligence.trustBuilding: Search functionality, clear selection indication, undo patterns for accidental selections
intelligence.semanticMeaning: Option structure: value=data, label=display, group=categorization, disabled=unavailable choices

intelligence.attentionEconomics: Content organization: visible=current context, hidden=available contexts, active=user focus
intelligence.accessibility: Arrow key navigation, tab focus management, panel association, screen reader support
intelligence.trustBuilding: Persistent selection, clear active indication, predictable navigation patterns
intelligence.semanticMeaning: Structure: tablist=navigation, tab=option, tabpanel=content, selected=current view
